app.name: Street Fighter 3.3
app.author: R-Sam based on RetroArch
app.long_description:
One-click run Street Fighter III 3rd Strike - Fight for the Future.
Channel Forwarders are stored in sd:/wad/sfiii3.
The original files are shared by "Zorg" on YouTube.
Website: https://github.com/R-Sam-1980/cps3
- GameID: 800708 - Developer & Publisher: Capcom - Genre: Fight / Versus - Released: 1999 - Players: 2

arguments.arg: sd:/Games/Arcade (FB Alpha 2012 CPS-3)/Street Fighter III 3rd Strike - Fight for the Future
